title: Couple With Heart Man Person Medium Light Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple, specifically a man and a person, with a heart between them. It signifies love, romance, and a strong relationship between a man and a person. The specific skintones indicate a medium-light toned person and a light toned man.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji showcases two figures connected by a heart, with a medium-light skin tone and a light skin tone, symbolizing a romantic relationship or deep affection. Apple's rendering imbues the figures with gentle 3D shading and soft, rounded edges, giving them a tender and approachable quality. The prominent heart, rendered with glossy highlights and a rich hue, radiates warmth and love, making it a universally understood expression of partnership and adoration across Apple devices.
